forum.name: bugs and glitches
forum.description: post bugs and glitches you find here
forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: camera button setting broken?

comments.text: i cant find the camera button propery anywhere and when hitting clone on a thing with a working camera button there is a ding, even if nothing was changed and the camera button no
longer works, as if the camera button setting had been turned off, attached is a working cloneable camera, clone it and press done and it should be broken.
i was taught its now done by scripting, nvmd.
yes sorry, this was deprecated in favor of scripted buttons. for downwards-compatibility old objects would still work, but as soon as they're edit-cloned, they'd need to switch.
the command for anyone having the same issue is "then show camera controls"

thread.latestCommentText: the command for anyone having the same issue is "then show camera controls"
